summary: A college student drops out to use her talents as a dancer in the community. She rents a failing theatre to put on a hip-hop production of 'Romeo and Juliet,' but arguments between the cast members threaten to ruin the entire project.
cast: Cassie Ventura|Kenny Wormald|Dena Kaplan|Sibongile Mlambo|Bobby Lockwood|Clayton Evertson|Terry Sauls|Stephen Jubber|Ambrose Uren|Peter Butler|Adrian Galley|Brandon Petersen|Sivuyile Ngesi|Adam Cope|Jason Meyer|Ashlynn Cloete|Conway October|Andrea Dondolo|Sipho Malunga|Sue Diepeveen|Carolyn Forword|Juanique Randall|Jill Middelkop|Jarrid Geduld|Dries Botha|Sam Willoughby|Adam Malebo|Buntu Plam|Daneeka Gutuza|Jonathan Matroos|Natalie Walsh|Nkosentsha Tamana|Thabisa Dinga|Thami Njoko|Yaeesh Campher|Yakin Pillay|Chester Martinez|Darren Brijder|Duane Williams|Jared Schaedler|Lisa Staci Smith|Mandy Papier|Michelle Oppenshaw|Shawan Luo|Tevin Wiener|Toufeeq Baatijies|Angelique Theys|Amanda Klotz|Corinne De Beer|Dimitri Louw|Graham Swartz|Kelly Ernstzen|Kyle Anthony|Linda Ndlovu|Shameelah Kinnear|Sipho Didiza|Basimane G.N.F. title: Honey 3: Dare to Dance
